# signal-behavioral-primitives

## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description                                           | Type      | Default |
| -------------- | --------------- | ----------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `enabled`      | `enabled`       | Enable/disable all behaviors.                         | `boolean` | `true`  |
| `lockScroll`   | `lock-scroll`   | Lock document scroll while mounted.                   | `boolean` | `false` |
| `restoreFocus` | `restore-focus` | Restore the previously focused element on disconnect. | `boolean` | `false` |
